Contents of SPECIMEN

The SPECIMEN package contains a number of modules and subpackages, which are listed below.

To seach by name, use the Index, for a list of the modules, see Module Index.

specimen subpackages

  • specimen.classes
    • specimen.classes.reports submodule
      • SpecimenModelInfoReport
  • specimen.core
    • specimen.core.refinement subpackage
      • specimen.core.refinement.annotation submodule
      • specimen.core.refinement.cleanup submodule
      • specimen.core.refinement.extension submodule
      • specimen.core.refinement.smoothing submodule
    • specimen.core submodules
      • specimen.core.analysis
      • specimen.core.bidirectional_blast
      • specimen.core.generate_draft_model
      • specimen.core.validation
  • specimen.util
    • specimen.util submodules
    • specimen.util.set_up module
      • build_data_directories()
      • dict_recursive_check()
      • dict_recursive_combine()
      • download_config()
      • download_mnx()
      • validate_config()
    • specimen.util.util module
      • create_DIAMOND_db_from_folder()
      • create_NCBIinfo_mapping()
      • get_info_GenBank_Record()

specimen submodules

The direct submodules of specimen are mainly for accessing the tool. They consists of one module for the command line access and a second one for running the pipeline as a whole.

  • specimen.cmd_access
  • specimen.workflow
    • run_complete()
    • wrapper_pipeline()
